name: Pink Punk Apocalypse
description:
A round-based pixel shooter game, with a "trial and error" playstyle.

Play as Dr. Shadows in this pink punk apocalypse, where a neon infection has almost destroyed the world, and give everything to protect the last humanity's hope.

Note: The PPA version is the original one made for the Jam; the post Jam version is just an unload with a couple (literally two) bug fixes i made. I keep them separated because i'm not sure if i should upload the game while the voting is going on.
